lines: Olinda luba lwa Zioni, KotwaÕmbila nciÕndi nzi?
Sena mula kubona kusalala? Sena mula kubona kusalala?
Tula kumana musinzo, Sena twabona nyika?
Sena twabona bulelo bwa Jesu, Sena twabona bulelo bwa Jesu?
Izuba lila fwambaana, Atu baambile bonse;
Twabona Intanda yazwa, Ila salala kuya,
Nobasale muimbe ula boola Nobasale muimbe ula boola
Swebo tufwambana kwenda, Inkomwe yali bonya,
Majwi enu aimbe kukomana, Majwi enu aimbe kukomana.
